about_the_game:
Don’t Cheat on me is a multiplayer game where players play as the Husband, the Wife or the Neighbour to try to dominate this marriage.

Features

  • A cheating story with three players.
  • Multiple maps, each with unique gameplay.
  • Three character types to play as, each with unique skillsets.
  • Different props with different combats and combos.
  • Wife and Neighbour will have special interactions to increase intimacy.
  • Lots of places to hide, characters even got a special skill to hide themselves.
  • Randomized game setup for extra replayability.
  • Win the game alone or collaborate with each other, lots of possibilities.

Husband

The Husband needs to catch Wife and Neighbour. He owns powerful weapons and skillsets. Any close contact between Wife and Neighbour will increase his power.

Wife

The Wife needs to get things done and escape. A good collaboration between her and Neighbour will make them stronger. Her ability will be entirely different if used on Husband or Neighbour.

Neighbour

The Neighbour has to finish his jobs and escape. Use in-game props and your taunt skillsets to better hide and fight back. Also, collaboration is the key.
detailed_description:
Please update your game to the latest!

Hello players, thank you for playing Don't Cheat On Me!

Please update your game to the latest, otherwise, you may be kicked out of game room because of the old game version.

Thank you and hope you all enjoy the game!

A Normal Monkey Studios

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Don't Cheat On Me

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 740
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 950 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Don’t Cheat on me is a multiplayer game where players play as the Husband, the Wife or the Neighbour, trying to dominate this marriage.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
